FuncDef: This command associates a BFD sessions with the named oper-group so that if the BFD session fails then the oper-group is changed to operationally down and all monitoring interfaces should also be brought operationally down.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the source interface, up to 32 characters in length, for the BFD sessions to be monitored for the associated oper-group.
Specifies the destination IPv4 address for the BFD sessions to be monitored for the associated oper-group.
Specifies the service ID, up to 64 characters in length, in which the BFD session exists if it is not in the base routing context.
